text: "Senses Working Overtime" is a 1982 song by English rock band XTC and is the lead single from their fifth studio album English Settlement. It went to number 10 in the United Kingdom, number 12 in Australia and number 15 in Ireland. It was covered by Mandy Moore in 2004. == References == Category:1982 songs Category:XTC songs Category:Mandy Moore songs
title: Senses Working Overtime
